docs.snippet: Though it will play a championship football game next season, its board of directors was “not ready to vote” on adding teams at its spring meeting....
docs.lead_paragraph: Though it will play a championship football game next season, its board of directors was “not ready to vote” on adding teams at its spring meeting.
docs.abstract: Big 12 Conference board of directors approve return of championship football game in 2017, but have yet to decide whether to expand league beyond 10 teams; other football news noted.

headline.main: Big 12 Conference Passes on Vote to Expand, for Now
headline.print_headline: Big 12 Passes on a Vote to Expand, for Now
